game.name: RoRX
game.categories: 멀티플레이어, MMO, PvP, 온라인 PvP, 협동, 온라인 협동, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 앱 내 구매, 통계, 레벨 에디터 포함, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Multiplayer strategy game combining collectible card game, hexagonal grid arenas, and army customization. Based on "Rounds", bridging real-time and turn-based gameplay, its unique combat system places strategy at the core of victory conditions.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Multiplayer strategy game combining collectible card game, hexagonal grid arenas, and army customization. Based on "Rounds", bridging real-time and turn-based gameplay, its unique combat system places strategy at the core of victory conditions.
